SELECT fault.id, tunnel.tunnel_name AS tunnel_id, fault_location, z.dict_label AS fault_type, fault.fault_source, fault.fault_fxtime, fault.fault_cxtime, fault.fault_tbr, fault.fault_tbtime, fault.eq_id, e.state_name AS eq_status, s.state_name AS eq_run_status, fault.fault_code, x.dict_label AS fault_level, c.dict_label AS fallt_remove_statue, CASE WHEN fault.fault_status = '0' THEN '未消除' WHEN fault.fault_status = '1' THEN '已消除' END AS fault_status, fault_description, img_file_id FROM sd_fault_list fault LEFT JOIN sd_device_data d ON fault.eq_id = d.device_id LEFT JOIN sd_device_type_item i ON i.id = d.item_id LEFT JOIN sd_devices t ON t.eq_id = fault.eq_id LEFT JOIN sd_equipment_state s ON s.state_type_id = i.device_type_id AND s.device_state = d.DATA AND s.state_type = '2' LEFT JOIN sd_equipment_state e ON e.state_type_id = i.device_type_id AND e.device_state = d.DATA AND e.state_type = '1' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data z ON z.dict_value = fault.fault_type AND z.dict_type = 'fault_type' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data x ON x.dict_value = fault.fault_level AND x.dict_type = 'fault_level' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data c ON c.dict_value = fault.fallt_remove_statue AND c.dict_type = 'fault_remove_statue' LEFT JOIN sd_tunnels tunnel ON tunnel.tunnel_id = fault.tunnel_id WHERE fault.id = #{id}
